sec.label: B.3.7
sec.title: System for the measurement of inclination as regards stability
sec.p: For checking the stability under tramming condition and whilst working with a capacity table, the rig shall be equipped with a measuring system, e.g. an inclinometer. The measuring system shall show the operator the actual absolute forward, backward and lateral inclination of the drill mast (when this is relevant to the stability). If major parts of the rig can be moved horizontally and this has an effect on the stability, the operator shall be able to determine the position of these parts from the operator's position.
A simple system for measuring the absolute inclination of the rig shall be provided, e.g. a bubble level or a pendulum system.
